text: Suatisi () is a village in the historical region of Khevi, north-eastern Georgia. It is located on the right bank of the eponymous river Suatisi, on the southern slopes of the Khokhi Range. Administratively, it is part of the Kazbegi Municipality in Mtskheta-Mtianeti. Distance to the municipality center Stepantsminda is 38 km. == Sources == * Georgian Soviet Encyclopedia, V. 9, p. 588, Tbilisi, 1985 year. ==References== Category:Kobi Community villages
title: Suatisi
